Preserve the old tag. #set ($discard = $newTags.add($tag)) #end #end #if ($newTags.size() > 0) #set ($parentReference = $services.model.createDocumentReference($doc.wiki, $doc.space, $newTags.get(0))) #set ($parentFullName = $services.model.serialize($parentReference, 'compactwiki')) #set ($discard = $fileDoc.setParent($parentFullName)) ## Update the tags. #set ($discard = $fileDoc.getObject('XWiki.TagClass').set('tags', $newTags)) #end #end
